data.title: Epaper Software Services
data.meta_description: Pressmart Media Limited offering Epaper Software Services in Hyderabad, Telangana. Get best price and find contact details | ID: 8655260512
data.text:
Pressmart Media Limited was established in the year 2006. We are the global digital media company . Founded 10+ years ago, we offer a “Horizontal Media Platform” for global publications – content anytime, anywhere on any device. We thrive in moving traditional media such as newspapers, magazines, journals, books, and corporate collateral into the digital world and make it accessible… some language on devices is needed

With tech-savy readers and advertisers increasingly moving online and explosive growth in mobile platforms and social media, traditional publishers have no choice but to move with them. Our flagship solution ”Publication Cloud” helps publishers connect with customers in entirely new way in this space. Pressmart revenue model is based on per page processing fee and Ad Revenue share mainly from Google.
